name: Azimuth
description:
Description

You are a lone survivor in space whose ship got hit by an asteroid. You wake up to find that your ship is in dire need of repair and the crew is all gone. These problems need to be fixed before its to late. Oxygen is low and the damage to the ship will just get worse if nothing is done. You have to act now. There are four rooms with different repair needs that when fixed can help the player with buffs that will aid them. When all the rooms are repaired the player wins the game.

Controls:

Keyboard input:

W - Up

A - Left

D - Right

S - Down

E - Interact

Xbox Controller input:

Left stick - movement.

A - Interact
